events.title: Day Trip to Koh Samet
events.description: Escape to the beautiful Koh Samet island for a full day of sun, sand, and crystal-clear water. Price includes round-trip transport, ferry tickets, and lunch. Bring sunscreen and your swimsuit!

cta.label: Book now
cta.message: Hi! I want to join the Koh Samet trip

events.title: Thai Cooking Class
events.tagline: Learn 3 authentic dishes with our chef
events.description: Join our experienced Thai chef for a hands-on cooking experience. You'll learn to prepare Pad Thai, Green Curry, and Mango Sticky Rice. All ingredients and equipment provided. Vegetarian options available.

cta.label: Book your spot
cta.message: Hi! I'd like to join the Cooking Class

events.title: Friday Bar Crawl
events.tagline: Explore the best local bars with us
events.description: Join fellow travelers for a guided tour of the neighborhood's hidden gem bars. We'll visit 4 unique spots, each with a free welcome drink included. Make new friends and discover places you'd never find on your own!

cta.label: Join the crawl
cta.message: Hi! I want to join Friday's bar crawl

events.title: Morning Yoga Session
events.tagline: Start your day with mindful stretching
events.description: Wake up with a gentle 45-minute yoga session on our rooftop terrace. Suitable for all levels. Mats provided. Come in comfortable clothes and bring water.

events.title: Pasta Night
events.description: Our weekly community dinner! Fresh homemade pasta served in the common room. Vegetarian and gluten-free options available. Bring your own drinks and good vibes.
